Text.val: on 11.8.2005 WJ SCR8778 add new parameter
@ Part of previous ODC210, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825
29.10.2013 JH SCR18469 Added parameter pi.DEBC_INCASSOTYPE in call of BID018
-- Check mandatory fields, always have be in file, else error
-- If no errors --> Perfrom database updates
-- Field which have to be always updated
-- Call BID015 for previous handeld invoice, changes have to be stored before
... only if all T203 rows were handeld
